segments.text: He has had a fever for one day . Just now at home , he had febrile convulsions with teeth and fists clenched and eyes turned up . We were at a loss what to do . We called an ambulance and brought the baby here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long did the convulsion last ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does he have any other complaints ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Three days ago , he began to cough , sneeze and have a running nose . Yesterday , he began to have a fever .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was 38 ° C this morning and it was 39 ° C just now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me examine him to see if there is any rash . No rash .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is it serious ? Is it meningitis ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , it is not meningitis . Just a high fever and convulsions , which results from a virus upper respiratory tract inflection .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does he have to be admitted to hospital ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . No need for admission . I'll give the baby analgia nose drops to bring down the temperature first . Then I will give you a prescription . The pink tablets are used for his fever . When his temperature is over 38 ° C , give him one tablet . The other tablets are sedatives for his convulsions . The white liquid is for the cold . Give the baby plenty of water to drink .
segments.speaker: S2
